biography.value:
Warlords are legendary battlefield commanders, whose names are spoken with awe. After a string of decisive victories, a warlord could easily take on the role of monarch or general and attract followers willing to die for the warlord’s banner.

Warlords urge their troops into the fray with shouted exhortations. You can roll on the Warlord Battle Cries table to select one, or choose a battle cry that fits with your campaign.

Warlord Battle Cries

d8 Battle Cry
1 “Remember why we fight!”
2 “Victory awaits!”
3 “For the crown!”
4 “Be monstrous to the enemy!”
5 “Fight so they fear us!”
6 “Weapons drawn! Spells at the ready!”
7 “To the Abyss with them!”
8 “You know what to do!”

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value: Plate consists of shaped, interlocking metal plates to cover the entire body. A suit of plate includes gauntlets, heavy leather boots, a visored helmet, and thick layers of padding underneath the armor. Buckles and straps distribute the weight over the body.

The warlord makes two Greatsword or Shortbow attacks.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d6 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d6 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
The warlord can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The warlord regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

Command Ally. The warlord targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the warlord, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.

Weapon Attack. The warlord makes one Greatsword or Shortbow attack.

Frighten Foe (Costs 2 Actions). The warlord targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear it, the target must succeed on a [[/save wis 16 format=long]] or be &Reference[frightened]{frightened} of the warlord until the end of warlord’s next turn.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
Indomitable (3/Day). The warlord can reroll a saving throw it fails. It must use the new roll.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
Survivor. The warlord regains [[/damage 10 type=heal average=false]] hit points at the start of its turn if it has fewer than half its hit points but at least 1 hit point.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse
